scripts.build: next build && mkdir -p out/api/clawhq && ln -sf /home/lolo/.openclaw/workspace/data/clawhq/tasks.json out/api/clawhq/tasks.json && rm -rf ~/.openclaw/workspace/.openclaw/extensions/clawhq/ui && cp -r out ~/.openclaw/workspace/.openclaw/extensions/clawhq/ui && ln -sf /home/lolo/.openclaw/workspace/data/clawhq/tasks.json ~/.openclaw/workspace/.openclaw/extensions/clawhq/ui/api/clawhq/tasks.json
